extendedInfo.description: This music visualizer brings your music to the screen in an explosion of bright colors.â¢ Visualizes whatever music or sound is coming from any other app. â¢ Dramatically displays artist name and track name for most popular music players.â¢ Extensive color and shape options to tweakâ¢ Save your settings as themes, and use the included Tasker / Locale plugin to load any of your saved themes in response to almost anything you can imagine. â¢Glistening particles keep the screen alive with motion even when music isn't playing (can be turned off)â¢ Option to auto-animate as if there is always music playingIf you want to see what it looks like before purchasing, check out the free full-screen version of Audio Glow.NOTE: To Galaxy S/S2/S3/S4, Galaxy Note 1/2, Galaxy Nexus and HTC Rezound owners: The visualizer will sporadically show a flatline with many music players, due to an Android bug related to the built-in DSP in these phones. This is a problem for all music visualizer apps on these phones, as evidenced by user reviews of other apps. Still looking for a work-around, but we'll probably have to wait for a future version of Android to fix it. If you have this problem, I apologize! Please email me and I will refund you.Please send me an email about which audio player you use if you aren't seeing meta data. I need to manually implement each player. A player can only be supported if its developer has decided to broadcast meta data within Android and I am able to contact them. I have attempted to contact the makers of Spotify, iHeartRadio, DoubleTwist, and TuneIn. If they get back to me, I might be able to support them.Audio from any app will be displayed, but only the following are known to also show meta data. Additionally, more may be supported if they have an option to turn on scrobbling.â¢ Google Musicâ¢ The built-in HTC and Samsung music playersâ¢ The built-in SonyEricsson music player on phones not yet running Android 4.0 â¢ Amazon MP3â¢ Rdioâ¢ Apolloâ¢ WinAmpâ¢ Last.fmâ¢ MIUI playerâ¢ Real Playerâ¢ PowerAmp (must enable scrobbling via Simple Last.fm in settings)â¢ Subsonicâ¢ GoneMAD (must enable scrobbling via Simple Last.fm or ScrobbleDroid in settings)â¢ BubbleUPnP (must enable scrobbling via Simple Last.fm and have Simple Last.fm Scrobbler installed)â¢ Any media players that support Simple Last.fm Scrobbler or ScrobbleDroid.[ dkeesto d'keesto software ]

reviews.title: Sweet app great support
reviews.comment: Love this because its fully customizable i can match it to any CM10 theme, Unfortunately it no longer works on my Note 2, Not the developers fault tho (Android bug) but I suggested something that would make it appear working using the tasker plugin and developer said he would look into it so hopefully I can use this again someday :) I really want to try the new strings feature, @ People saying it doesn\'t work, you need to learn to read an apps description before installing it. Its there for a reason.
